Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/status/xstatus

What you'll find here: display information about your system

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

Xmemuse.0.4.tgz (LSM entry) 1996-05-08
shows free-used-buffers-shared/ram-swap in a chart (6136 bytes)
procmeter-2.4.tgz (LSM entry) 1998-01-10
graphical statistics about CPU usage, disk access, network load (40061 bytes)
procmeter3-3.1.tgz (LSM entry) 1999-03-06
Displays in a series of graph (using X windows) statistics about sys status (54123 bytes)
tkps_1.10.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1997-07-13
tk interface to ps (12907 bytes)
xbench_bin_src.tar.z 1993-07-02
bins and src to calculate X performance (43541 bytes)
xcolormap.tar.Z 1992-10-14
show the entries in the current default colormap (6567 bytes)
xcolors.tar.z (LSM entry?) 1993-08-03
displays all of the colors in rgb.txt (9861 bytes)
xcolors.txt (LSM entry?) 1993-08-03
xdpyinfo.tar.Z 1992-10-14
displays information about the current X server (92527 bytes)
xfsm-1.99.tgz (LSM entry) (LSM entry) 1999-02-19
shows file system free space (51872 bytes)
xhtalk-2.9.linux.tgz (LSM entry?) (LSM entry) 1994-09-02
shows a dynamic 'menu' of users logged in (44411 bytes)
xhtalk-2.9p1-linux.tgz (LSM entry?) (LSM entry) 1995-08-29
shows a menu of logged in users and starts talk sessions (48302 bytes)
xload-procps.c.z 1993-04-02
Displays system load histogram (src needs procps) (1109 bytes)
xloadtime-2.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-03-04
an enhanced version of XLoad (4555 bytes)
xmem-1.02.tgz (LSM entry) 1997-09-23
displays bar graphs of real and virtual memory use (27167 bytes)
xnetload-1.6.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-02-13
Xnetload displays packet traffic and uptime in an X window (20504 bytes)
xosview-1.7.1.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-02-25
displays cpu/memory/swap/network usage (136392 bytes)
xperfmon++-1.2.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-01-29
shows system status in X (34672 bytes)
xps-1.0.tar.Z (IAFA) 1994-11-23
graphical version of ps (497841 bytes)
xsar-02.tgz (LSM entry) 1996-07-17
simple system activity reporter for X11 (12051 bytes)
xsysinfo-1.6.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1997-10-14
provides a graphical representation of system state (27776 bytes)
xwatch-2.09.tar.gz 1996-07-12
watches various log files in an x window (44141 bytes)
